name: Say Nice Things About Detroit
description:
In the grim darkness of the future, there is only Detroit...

In Say Nice Things About Detroit, you have no weapons, no magic powers, no skills to fend off the zombie hordes infesting post-apocalyptic Detroit. All you have... is kindness. Each nice thing you say about Detroit will destroy another zombie, and bring the city one step closer to salvation. Say Nice Things About Detroit is a typing-based niceness test: can you say nice things about Detroit fast enough to keep the zombies from overwhelming you?

CONTROLS:

  • Mash SPACEBAR to attack the zombies
  • Use the keyboard to say nice things about Detroit
  • WARNING: You cannot say nice things about Detroit while being attacked by zombies!

Designed by Max Cohen and Robert Pustelnik

Programmed by Andrew Feddersen

Art by Madeline Kane

Music: "Solitude" by Soularflair

This game was originally created in Spring 2021 for an Intro to Game Development class. If you like this game, you can support the developers by saying nice things about Detroit in real life.
